verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Break our hearts, oh God.
Break our hearts.
Break our hearts, oh God.
Break our hearts.
For the sin in our lives, break our hearts.
For the sin in our lives, break our hearts.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We cry out, we need Your help.
Come back to our land.
We confess, we've lived in sin.
Please show us Your power once again.
